name: Library Component Drop

movements.name: Drop

beats.title: Publish Create Requested
beats.scenario: Publish or Deploy publish Create Requested
acceptanceCriteria:
Given the publishCreateRequested operation is triggered
When the handler executes
Then it completes successfully within < 1 minute
And the output is valid and meets schema
And any required events are published

Given valid input parameters
When publishCreateRequested processes them
Then results conform to expected schema
And no errors are thrown
And telemetry events are recorded with latency metrics

Given error conditions
When publishCreateRequested encounters an error
Then the error is logged with full context
And appropriate recovery is attempted
And the system remains stable

Given performance SLA of < 1 minute
When publishCreateRequested executes
Then latency is consistently within target
And throughput meets baseline requirements
And resource usage stays within bounds

Given compliance and governance
When publishCreateRequested operates
Then all governance rules are enforced
And audit trails capture execution
And no compliance violations occur
beats.userStory: As an orchestrator, I need `publishCreateRequested` to forward to canvas-component create.
beats.testCase: forwards to drop symphony and does not render React nodes directly

movements.userStory: As an interaction designer, I need drop to publish create requests deterministically and clear preview state.
movements.businessValue: Enables automated deployment; reduces release cycle time by 70%; improves availability (target: 99.9%); supports CI/CD
